songs.title: Next Year
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Just when the flames have settled
The second fire rises
Oh, how I love my life
But hate these dark surprises
Just when the pain has settled
You face another crisis
Oh, how I love my life
But hate these dark surprises

[Pre-Chorus 1]
It's time we face the sun
Breathe and start to run
Putting pressure on my lungs
And you feel that pressure

[Chorus]
Never fear, the sunset's near
Bring us here and we're happy till next year
You and me, our mind runs free
Bring us here and we're happy till next year
All, all we need is, all, all we need is
All, all we need is, all, all we need is
All we need is generation
Bring us here and we're happy till next year

[Verse 2]
Just when your name feels special
They come in different guises
Oh, how I love my life
But hate these dark surprises
You feel the angels bless you
Their soft touch energises
Oh, how I love my life
But hate these dark surprises

[Pre-Chorus 2]
It's time we face the sun
No more childish fun
It's a special kind of love
And you feel so special

[Chorus]

[Bridge]
If a habit needs kicking, won't rest for the wicked
Don't you know?
Ain't got a problem with living, cause I live monolithic
Don't you know?
Don't you know?
Don't you know?
Don't you know?
Don't you know?

[Chorus]

[Outro]
Happy till next year
Happy till next year
Happy till next year, happy till next year
Happy till next year
